entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
